programme.desc: Aladdin and his friend Ali accidentally uncover a lamp that contains a genie - but instead of granting wishes...this genie has other plans.(n)

programme.title: Stars' Top Recipe At Fun-Staurant
programme.desc: Six gourmets in Korea's entertainment industry team up to explore the world of convenience stores.(n)

programme.title: Blade Man
programme.desc: Joo Hongbin is capable, rich and good-looking, but he is so ill-tempered! One day, this supercilious guy turns into a monster. When he is angry, blades spring out from his body. Sedong, a woman with a bright personality and Chang, his first love's son appear, making him confused.(n)

programme.title: Discovery Of Love
programme.desc: A woman has a conflict between her new love and old love. Han Yeoreum has started a new relationship with a perfect guy called Nam Hajin. However, her ex-boyfriend Kang Taeha returns while regretting his past. A story of a love triangle among these three young people.(n)

programme.title: We K-Pop Extra
programme.desc: K-Pop is enjoyed by people all around the globe. This is an in-depth variety show where K-Pop stars talk, perform and greet their fans. We K-Pop - of the fans, by the fans, for the fans. It is the global showcase for you, international fans!(n)

programme.title: Dogs Are Incredible
programme.desc: Korea's "Comedy King" Lee Gyenggyu who's also known for his love for dogs, along with the country's most famous dog expert Kang Hyungwook, team up to study how humans and pets live in peace and harmony.(n)

programme.title: DOCU INSIGHT

programme.desc: In a society that puts the spotlight on the smart guys, there are people who do not have a grain of common sense! In this knowledge-talk show, these people get locked up in a rooftop house and are allowed to go home only if they get 10 questions right!(n)

programme.title: Studio K
programme.desc: Studio K is KBS' digital entertainment and music channel. Catch the most entertaining content right here!(n)

programme.title: Korea On Stage - Jindo Ullim Sanbang
programme.desc: The stage of Korean classical musicians and K-Pop artists with the theme of Jindo Ullimsanbang, designated as Scenic Scenic No. 80, It is a comprehensive concert program that introduces cultural properties. It will show off its unique charm both at home and abroad.(n)

programme.title: Mr. House Husband
programme.desc: This reality show observes six men who do both housekeeping and parenting.(n)

programme.title: Studio K
programme.desc: Studio K is KBS' digital entertainment and music channel. Catch the most entertaining content right here!(n)

programme.title: The Conmen In Vegas
programme.desc: Master gambler King and his sidekick Dragon have gotten a new partner in the latter's swindler cousin Nat. Together, the trio successfully con a huge fortune from the underground casino owned by Brother Man. The vicious gang boss sends his henchmen after them, and Dragon is taken.(n)

programme.title: The Miracles Of The Namiya General Store
programme.desc: In 2012, Atsuya and his two childhood friends run into an old general store. They decide to stay there until the morning. Late into the night, Atsuya sees a letter in the mailbox.(n)

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: While two criminals hide out at a woman's apartment after a botched robbery, an ex-cop tries to find a missing gun.(n)

programme.title: Go Lala Go 2
programme.desc: A new cast breathes new life into the oft-adapted story of a modern woman who must learn to balance work, life and love. Lala starts a new career after a company restructures. She encounters a handsome and successful client, Chen Feng, who proposes to Lala.(n)

programme.title: Brotherhood Of Blades 2
programme.desc: In the Ming dynasty of China, Shen Lian, a secret police of corrupt government, is trapped by the conspiracy on a mission. To prove his innocence, he seeks the truth with a girl called Bei Zhai.(n)

programme.title: Royal Tramp
programme.desc: After saving Chan, the leader of the Heaven and Earth society, Wai Siu Bo, a lecherous wimp, is made a member. Following a botched first assignment for the group, he is made a servant to the Emperor, the very person the Heaven and Earth society wants to overthrow.(n)

programme.title: Get Outta Here
programme.desc: Lucky for everyone involved, Joe doesn't like to drink human blood, and he forms a bond with his new flat mates. However, other vampires do lurk in Hong Kong, and they soon side with the greedy land developers angling for Apple's flat.(n)

programme.title: More Than Blue
programme.desc: Sharing similar circumstances, K and Cream become best friends and share a home. Diagnosed with terminal illness, K never confesses his love for Cream. He wants her to settle down before his time runs out.(n)

programme.title: The God Of Cookery
programme.desc: This uproarious comedy centres on Sik San, the self-proclaimed God of Cookery. He hits the skids when his cooking empire is usurped by a mean-spirited rival. He is saved by the true love and good cooking of Sister Turkey, a plain but pure-hearted street vendor whose wares heal the sick.(n)

programme.title: Missing ()
programme.desc: In 2005, a high-profile case of a police officer who disappeared during a forest hike spawned urban legends about the existence of a gateway into another world. Those legends are now adapted into an eerie supernatural thriller.(n)

programme.title: Siew Lup
programme.desc: Mia, a former prostitute, becomes the wife of Quan, a roast meat shop owner. Suffering from physical violence by Quan, Mia meets Wu. A sinister plot begins when Wu and Mia fall in love.(n)

programme.title: Look For A Star
programme.desc: Inspired by the relationship between Stanly Ho and his fourth wife Angela, this is a romantic comedy about a billonaire who falls in love with a feisty casino dealer.(n)

programme.title: Ice Kacang Puppy Love
programme.desc: Set in a unique small town of 1980s Malaysia, this story revolves around a nice but shy boy, Botak, and a brave and adventurous girl, Da Jia Yu.(n)

programme.title: If You Are The One 2
programme.desc: Wealthy middle-aged entrepreneur Qin and beautiful flight attendant Xiaoxiao Liang question their relationship after presiding over good friends Mang Guo and Shan Li's lavish "divorce ceremony".(n)

programme.title: Napping Princess
programme.desc: In the near future, a high-school senior discovers that events in her waking life begin to parallel events in her dreams.(n)

programme.title: My Egg Boy
programme.desc: A woman freezes her eggs and looks for the right man to start a family. In the pursuit of this man, she ends up in a wintry Swedish Province, where ice and snow become a metaphor for the unborn child who is waiting to be born.(n)

programme.title: The Leakers
programme.desc: After a mutated Zika epidemic breaks out in Malaysia, an illegal hacker group, The Leakers, tries to disclose pharmaceutical company AMANAH Malaysia's conspiracy and crimes.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Wife
programme.desc: High schooler Nard is in a relationship with Mac. When Nard gets pregnant, her mother persuades her to abort the baby. However, Nard dies during the abortion, haunting the apartment complex.(n)

programme.title: All My Goddess
programme.desc: Four ladies, Eileen, Zhou Li Jun, Chen Ruo Yan and Zhang Jia Xin were colleagues as stewardesses 10 years ago. They are reunited at Jia Xin's wedding and gather in a resort in Penang. The friends are introduced to the bridegroom Gary, a Prince Charming look-alike.(n)

programme.title: Spl2 A Time For Consequences
programme.desc: Undercover cop Kit becomes a junkie in order to catch Mr Hung. When the operation goes sour and Kit blows his cover, his supervisor and uncle, Wah, decides to terminate the operation. When Kit disappears without a trace, Wah tracks Kit to a prison in Thailand.(n)

programme.title: Tomorrow Is Another Day
programme.desc: Wong Kam Fa is a middle-aged housewife whose life revolves around her 20-year-old autistic son. After learning that her husband is having an affair, she plots to take revenge on the mistress.(n)

programme.title: The Wasted Times
programme.desc: Over the course of several decades, a deal between the Japanese army and criminals in Shanghai plays out with violence and betrayal.(n)

programme.title: Murderer
programme.desc: Ling is a self-assured Police Chief Inspector who is investigating a cold-blooded serial murder case. However, due to the homicide attempt of a fellow inspector named Tai in which Ling emerged unscathed, colleagues are fast becoming aware of Ling's potential involvement.(n)

programme.title: Viral
programme.desc: A girl ends up at an abandoned building while playing an augmented reality game. She wins the game and takes a photo to commemorate her win. Later, she realises there is a mysterious girl in the photo she has taken. Worse, the mystery girl is now haunting her.(n)

programme.title: My Left Eye Sees Ghost
programme.desc: One night, May Ho suffers a car accident while driving drunk. A naughty ghost named Ken comes to save May's life and a strange thing happens - May's left eye has the ability to see ghosts!(n)

programme.title: Assembly
programme.desc: A soldier fights to gain recognition for comrades who died during the Chinese Civil War.(n)

programme.title: Fight Back To School 2
programme.desc: Despite being demoted, devoted cop Sing longs to win back the respect of his peers. When Sing is reassigned to an exclusive international school and uncovers a lucrative arms smuggling ring, he may have finally stumbled upon the case that will get him back on the beat.(n)

programme.title: Murmur Of The Hearts
programme.desc: Nan and Mei are brother and sister growing up on the beautiful Green Island, off the shore of the port city of Taitung in Taiwan. But soon their parents separate. Four-year-old Mei goes to Taipei with her mother, while seven-year-old Nan stays on Green Island with his father.(n)

programme.title: Distance
programme.desc: Businessman Chen travels to Guangxi for work. During a site visit, he catches sight of his estranged father. The father he resents is now a crippled old man who doesn't recognise him.(n)

programme.title: The Rope Curse
programme.desc: Hoping to make a viral video by streaming a mysterious rope ritual, a couple falls into a deadly curse instead that turns their lives upside down.(n)

programme.title: The Kid From The Big Apple
programme.desc: As Sarah's mother has to relocate to China on a work assignment, she has to turn to her estranged father back in Malaysia. To a 12-year-old contemporary youngster like Sarah, Malaysia seems like her worst nightmare come true.(n)

programme.title: The Farewell Girls
programme.desc: Three girls have been chasing their music dreams, but they keep failing until they met the owner of a funeral service company. They perform with a pair of funeral singers, but they do not get along well.(n)

programme.title: Suddenly Twenty
programme.desc: Parn is a stubborn old woman in her 70s whose only pleasure in life is to brag about her son who she single-handedly raised to be a professor. One day, she learns that her son is planning to send her off to a nursing home.(n)

programme.title: Call Of Heroes
programme.desc: During the warlords era in China, a village located in rural area called Pucheng falls into danger when the cruel commandant Cao from the enemy troops arrives and kills the innocent. The guardians of Pucheng are desperate to fight against Cao and protect their homeland.(n)

programme.title: Never Say Die
programme.desc: A male boxer switches bodies with the female reporter who exposed his bribes. Now they must help each other win the championship.(n)

programme.title: Legend Of The Demon Cat
programme.desc: In the Tang Dynasty, a demon cat appears and breaks the peace of Chang'an City, causing a series of strange events. Poet Bai Letian and Monk Kukai join hands to investigate the death of Concubine Yang.(n)

programme.title: Bakuman
programme.desc: Mashiro Moritaka has a knack for drawing. When classmate and aspiring writer Takagi Akito discovers Moritaka's drawing skills, he suggests they join forces to create a manga. Moritaka isn't so hot on the idea - that is, until a girl enters the picture to provide some extra motivation.(n)

programme.title: The Tag Along
programme.desc: After a funeral, a family is watching a trip video in which a weird-looking little girl in red is found tagging along the relative who passed away. But no one remembers seeing her anywhere during the trip.(n)

programme.title: House Of Fury
programme.desc: Teddy Yu appears to be just a Chinese chiropractor and widowed father. His son Nicky and daughter Natalie learn kung-fu from him, but the two kids are always skeptical of Teddy's claim of having a hidden life as a guardian for secret agents in the past. One day, Teddy gets kidnapped.(n)

programme.title: The Banquet
programme.desc: A loose adaptation of Hamlet, which is set in an empire in chaos. The Emperor, the Empress, the Crown Prince, the Minister and the General all have their own enemies they would like to finish off at a night banquet.(n)

programme.title: Marry A Rich Man
programme.desc: Me makes a wish upon a falling star - to marry a rich husband. She embarks on her adventure to seek a wealthy mate. Will she be able to find true happiness?(n)

programme.title: My Best Summer
programme.desc: Geng Geng had been an ordinary girl before her entry to the best high school in the province by chance. She doesn't like her life there until she meets Yu Huai, her seatmate - their names make up word 'Geng geng yu huai', meaning 'Unforgettable memories'.(n)

programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Mrs K is a story of a woman who gives everything that she has to protect her husband and daughter when enemies from her past come hunting her.(n)

programme.title: Wu Yen
programme.desc: Emperor Qi, the male ruler of an ancient kingdom overrun by warring tribes, is set to marry the warrior-heroine Wu Yen when a mischievous, bisexual sorceress known as Yin Chun falls in love with both of them and begins meddling in their affairs.(n)

programme.title: Bad Genius
programme.desc: Lynn, a genius high school student who makes money by cheating in tests, receives a new task that leads her to set foot in Sydney, Australia. Lynn and her classmates have to deliver the test answers back.(n)

programme.title: The Cases II
programme.desc: If spirits are everywhere, how can we solve the problem if they take offense by us? To reveal the truth, a crew proceeds by inviting a paranormal master to arrange a banquet serving all the ghosts around a graveyard, a so-called "extreme land".(n)

programme.title: Godspeed
programme.desc: A Taiwanese drug mule has his foolproof smuggling method thrown out of whack when he catches a ride with the wrong cab driver, in this highly-entertaining caper starring Hong Kong comedy legend Michael Hui.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye Mr. Loser
programme.desc: At the wedding of his former high-school crush Qiu Ya, unemployed musician Xia Luo is bitter about how successful his classmates have become and all that never was for him. The drunk Xia Luo hides in the bathroom and passes out. When he wakes up, he finds himself back in 1997 as a teenager.(n)

programme.title: The Only Mom
programme.desc: A family moves out of town to raise an autistic daughter peacefully. The girl sleeps at daytime and awakes at night. The house gets stranger day by day with a mystery unsolved for decades.(n)

programme.title: Dog Days
programme.desc: In a poor suburb of Changsha, Lulu works as a nightclub dancer while her boyfriend Bai Long takes care of their infant son. One night, she returns home to find both of them gone.(n)

programme.title: C'est La Vie, Mon Cheri
programme.desc: A jazz musician who has problems in both his life and career moves into a poor neighbourhood. There, he meets a girl who starts to become interested in him because of his saxophone skills.(n)

programme.title: Exit No. 6
programme.desc: A tight-knit group of teenagers get in over their heads while investigating a rash of disturbing disappearances.(n)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Chun Wai, a young screenwriter, falls for aspiring actress Mei Ball who can't find the success an actress of her calibre deserves. Instead, all the accolades go to Lulu, Mei Ball's gorgeous but unskilled actress friend.(n)

programme.title: Young Love Lost
programme.desc: Adapted from a critically-acclaimed contemporary Chinese novel, Young Love Lost presents the melancholy and beauty of Lu Xiaolu's misspent youth in a small town in South China during the 1990s.(n)

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: Powerful Chief Inspector Lak and his cohorts have practically turned half of Hong Kong into their corruption empire. This prompts the Hong Kong Governor to set up an anti-corruption arm to fight them.(n)

programme.title: Ode To My Father
programme.desc: During the Korean war, a young boy is separated from his father, but in their parting moments he promises to take care of the family. As he grows up, he experiences some incredible events.(n)

programme.title: Super Express
programme.desc: A modest super-express delivery courier gets entangled in a spiral of adventure and romance in Shanghai.(n)

programme.title: Line Walker 2
programme.desc: After they uncover evidence that there is corruption in the police force, three police officers in Hong Kong try to discover which of them can be trusted.(n)

programme.title: David Loman 2
programme.desc: Comedian Zhu Ge Liang reprises his role as gang boss Loman who has since settled down to a more lawful life, running a guesthouse with wife Nana. However, things are no less peaceful with Loman welcoming gangsters into his guesthouse for free.(n)

programme.title: Doraemon The Movie : Nobita’s Great Adventure
programme.desc: Doraemon transports Nobita and his friends to a huge iceberg floating in the South Pacific. While creating an amusement park with the "ice-working iron", the group finds a mysterious golden ring.(n)

programme.title: Shining Moment
programme.desc: After being sidelined by the gymnastics team, Yu quits and reinvents himself as a Latin dance instructor. He assembles a group of children for a Latin dance competition. Can Yu teach them to dance?(n)

programme.title: The Last Thieves
programme.desc: Young entrepreneur Yin Tzu-hsiang and his partners dream to change the unreasonable structure of the current economy with blockchain. Yin meets Hsu Ching, realising that he has to change himself first.(n)

programme.title: The Return Of The Cuckoo
programme.desc: After Kwan Ho marries and migrates to America, Man Cho continues with his life in Macau. He is a busy tour guide and has developed a close bond with his mute friend Kiki.(n)

programme.title: The Viral Factor
programme.desc: International Security Affairs agent Jon is on a dangerous mission to escort a criminal scientist to another country. En route, a member of his team, Sean, turns out to be a traitor and shoots Jon in the head while kidnapping the scientist.(n)

programme.title: Little Forest
programme.desc: A young woman grows tired of life in the city and returns to her hometown in the countryside.(n)

programme.title: Perfect Exchange
programme.desc: Mindy Chan is a top-notch gambler and swindler. His girlfriend Lily and friend Ah Chi are card dealers at the casino where bad guy Lau and his mistress Mona frequent. During a card game, Ah Chi and Mindy swindle millions of dollars from Lau, but they are caught. Lau makes a deal with Mindy.(n)

programme.title: You Shoot, I Shoot
programme.desc: Hong Kong is an over-crowded city where people are easily provoked with confilcts and hatred. In such a crammed and hostile place, professional hitmen are in demand.(n)

programme.title: The Witness
programme.desc: Lu Xiao Xing is a rookie cop who goes to a night club to find her adoptive brother and bring him home to chastise him for getting expelled from school and pursuing a frivolous dream of being a singer. As they argue in the car, her brother sends the car flying off the overpass.(n)

programme.title: Shaolin
programme.desc: During the warlord era of early Republican China, a warlord named Hou Jie defeats a rival, Huo Long, and seizes control of Dengfeng. Huo Long flees to Shaolin Temple to hide, but Hou Jie appears and shoots him after tricking him out of his treasure map.(n)

programme.title: Memory Eclipse - Final Round
programme.desc: One night while driving a taxi, former boxer Ma inadvertently rescues Yu Qing, a pregnant nightclub hostess, from a dangerous gangster. They run away and move constantly in order to stay hidden from the underworld. But their past eventually catches up to them.(n)

programme.title: Driving Miss Wealthy
programme.desc: A man is hired to look after a spoiled rich girl, but is then pulled into a scheme meant for her to re-evaluate her life.(n)

programme.title: Burning
programme.desc: Based on the Japanese novel Barn Burning by Haruki Murakami, Burning centres on the mystery surrounding chaebol Ben, delivery man Jong-su and young lady Hae-mi.(n)

programme.title: Grey Met Shrek
programme.desc: Sometimes fairy tales don't turn out the way you expect. Grey is an office worker with a shopping addiction. One day, just after being fired, she sees a gorgeous pair of shoes. Before she fully understood what she was doing she's stolen the shoes, and in a bid to escape she climbs into a truck.(n)

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: Extreme sports lover Zhou Feng gets involved in an international illegal trade by accident, so he has to follow an international special agent Bruce to Budapest. Bruce and the rookies start a fight with the terrorists.(n)
Many women feel turning 30 years old is a big step in their lives. The ageing issue not just affects them in feeling tired and experiencing loss of energy, but also drives them to feel sad.(n)

programme.title: 100 Ways To Murder Your Wife
programme.desc: Two men plot to kill their beautiful but nagging and unbearable wives.(n)

programme.title: Wonder Women ()
programme.desc: A feminist comedy with buxom-but-ditzy Dodo Cheng and twiggy-but-intelligent Cecelia Yip as contestants in a beauty pageant.(n)

programme.title: The Good The Bad & The Beauty
programme.desc: A clever stewardess tries to double-cross an international smuggling ring by sneaking their loot into a hiding place.(n)

programme.title: Spooky Encounters
programme.desc: Villager Bold Cheung, known for his willingness to do anything courageous or daring, becomes a target by the evil rich Master Tam who wants to keep Cheung's wife as his mistress. Cheung is tricked into a bet to spend the night in a haunted temple.(n)

programme.title: The Private Eyes
programme.desc: A small detective agency has problems staying in business, and out of trouble.(n)

programme.title: Queen's Bench III
programme.desc: Bumbling lawyer Alfred Cheung is assigned to a sensational murder case involving Tony Leung and Carina Lau, with farcical results.(n)

programme.title: You Bet Your Life
programme.desc: Gambling-obsessed couple Mr and Mrs Luo, after hearing that a rival called Snake's recent run of luck has been due to his taking of "coffin air", decide to follow him one night, ending up in a run-down mortuary.(n)

programme.title: Full Throttle
programme.desc: One of Hong Kong's top motorcycle racers is forced to reevaluate his entire way of life after a serious accident and the loss of a close friend.(n)

programme.title: The Diary Of A Big Man
programme.desc: Chow Ting-Fat loves two women equally and cannot say no to either as both bring the proposal of marriage to him. Number one is Joey Wong, a boutique owner. Number two is Sally Yeh, a stewardess.(n)

programme.title: The Hitman
programme.desc: Fu is an ex-solider adept at kung-fu fighting. When a triad discovers Fu's fighting prowess, they entreat the gentle tough guy to help score a $100-million bounty placed on the "King of Assassins". But hitmen of all shapes and sizes appear to claim the reward for themselves!(n)

programme.title: Warriors Two
programme.desc: Hua stumbles upon a plot hatched by a businessman named Mo to take over the city of Fushan by killing its headman.(n)

programme.title: Police Story
programme.desc: Kevin is assigned the job of protecting drug lord Cho's secretary Selena, who is going to testify against him. When the trial date comes, Selena disappears and Cho is set free for lack of evidence. Kevin is framed by Cho for murder, and goes on the run from the bad guys as well as the police.(n)

programme.title: Lord Of East China Sea
programme.desc: Ray Lui excels as the King of Gangsters in old Shanghai - scheming, killing and loving his way through the roaring '20s.(n)

programme.title: Chocolate Inspector
programme.desc: Inspector Chocolate has served the Special Crime Squad for a long time, but lacks achievement. One day, Superintendent Chao assigns his daughter Anita to Chocolate's team for a mysterious missing child case.(n)

programme.title: The Great Pretenders
programme.desc: Taiwanese swindler Mr. Giant loses in a poker match against Hong Kong swindler Wong Seung-chin, and they become sworn enemies. Meanwhile, Wong's apprentice Snake Wai meets Susan, a widow who recently returned to Hong Kong from Singapore.(n)

programme.title: Sixty Million Dollar Man
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays a rich playboy who is blown up by a mafia boss when he flirts with the boss' girl. Through a series of circumstances his professor makes him a synthetic body that allows him to change into a variety of household products.(n)

programme.title: The Conman
programme.desc: Previously imprisoned for an accidental killing, King returns to the world with his gambling skills intact, but his spirit gone. Help comes in the form of Skinny Dragon and his sexy sister Ching, who initially can't stand King, but eventually starts to warm to his undeniable charm.(n)

programme.title: Front Page
programme.desc: Hui, an owner of a Hong Kong tabloid magazine company, hires martial artist Bill Lee (Sam Hui) to help him get a good headliner for a magazine story to hopefully save his failing business.(n)

programme.title: Banana Cop
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates a London Chinatown crime with the help of prisoner Teddy Robin and blind teacher Cherie Chung.(n)

programme.title: The Inspector Wears Skirts
programme.desc: Jackie Chan produced this female version of Police Academy, with cop Siblelle Hu heading an all-girl commando training camp.(n)

programme.title: Marry A Rich Man
programme.desc: Me, a delivery girl, declares to the heavens that she must marry a rich man. On a flight to Milan, Me meets Christmas, a cute, rich Hong Kong resident who immediately takes a shine to Me. She thinks she's hit the jackpot, but as soon as they land the two are pick-pocketed.(n)

programme.title: My Father Is A Hero
programme.desc: Gong Wei is a Chinese government special agent who is assigned to work undercover in Hong Kong. To gain trust from the gang leader, Gong Wei has to take part in a shootout, taking Inspector Anita Fong as hostage.(n)

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow II
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as the twin brother of the character he played in the first film. The sequel sees Tse-ho working together with brother Tse-kit to help the police break a counterfeit syndicate. They discover Lung is in danger of being killed by his employee, Ko.(n)

programme.title: Needing You
programme.desc: Andy is a womanizing sales manager at a Hong Kong electronics firm who finds his life embroiled in office politics and gossip when he gets involved in the life of Kinki, a kooky office lady who is emotionally daffy but genuinely delightful.(n)

programme.title: The Seventh Curse
programme.desc: Chow Yun-Fat is Wisely, Hong Kong's Indiana Jones, in an adventure involving a Thai curse and a Buddhist gem.(n)

programme.title: THE PERFECT MATCH ()
programme.desc: Frankie Chan is a smooth-talking car salesman who meets his match when he encounters bumbling private eye Josephine Siao.(n)

programme.title: Passion
programme.desc: Sylvia Chang performs in a tragic but romantic love story between two women and a man.(n)

programme.title: Heroes Shed No Tears
programme.desc: John Woo's first action film is a tale of CIA-recruited commandos battling drug lords in the Golden Triangle.(n)

programme.title: BB30
programme.desc: It's a madcap comedy of errors involving yuppie lawyer Kenny Bee, his doctor wife Dodo Cheng and a car with license number BB30!(n)

programme.title: It's A Mad Mad Mad World
programme.desc: Bill, a TV news reporter, tries to make ends meet to support himself, his wife and three teenage daughters in urban Hong Kong. In the mist of the misadventures of Bill and his family, their luck and lives ultimately change when Bill's wife suddenly wins the lottery.(n)

programme.title: All The Wrong Spies
programme.desc: Private eye Yoyo enlists help from Inspector Robin to obtain a secret formula for an important weapon in war-time China under Japanese attack.(n)

programme.title: Dragon Town Story
programme.desc: The story begins on the wedding day of Lanjuan, whose marriage is put on hold when gunmen kill her entire family.(n)

programme.title: The Adventurers ()
programme.desc: As his parents are murdered by their good friend Ray , Andy is determined to take revenge for them when he grows up.(n)

programme.title: Why Why Tell Me Why
programme.desc: Anita Mui learns that mahjong and romance don't mix in a comedy where she must curb her mahjong addiction to get Anthony Chan.(n)

programme.title: Final Justice ()
programme.desc: Cheung Tit Chu, a senior inspector of the Special Crime Investigation Department in the Police Force, likes to make decisions and execute duties independently. Cheung's character brings him into conflict with his new superior, David Law, and his work is always hindered by the latter.(n)

programme.title: Parking Service
programme.desc: An optimistic Stanley decides to part with his beloved uncle and aunt and seek an ideal job. He joins a parking service team and earns good reputation for his team.(n)

programme.title: Papa Can You Hear Me Sing
programme.desc: Suen Yuen plays a scrap collector who raises an abandoned baby girl to become a singer. When she reaches the top, he dies and can't hear her sing anymore.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye Darling
programme.desc: Tai and Josephine are a merry couple. Tai brings his wife to his hotel's annual ball. Among his colleagues, there is a notorious seducer. Tai, with the help of his close friend Choi Sum, makes every effort to protect his wife, bringing themselves into a series of hilarious and comic situations.(n)

programme.title: Master Q
programme.desc: Comic book characters Master Q and Potato meet Nicholas Tse and Cecilia Cheung in a dazzling mixture of animation and live action.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: The fact that his mission is to kill Nuwa eventually dawns on Cheung San. Tin Yau and others uncover the grave of Pangu. Mimi sacrifices herself to give the Pangu Bow to Tin Yau, whereas Big Mi dies protecting Nino.(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Wife
programme.desc: A playboy lawyer decides to settle down, and finds a girl from China to have a makeover and become the perfect wife.(n)

programme.title: A Man Called Hero
programme.desc: This story follows Hero Hua from an ill-omened June day in his youth to a showdown 17 years later with a disaffected member of his martial arts school, a Japanese named Invincible.(n)

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow III
programme.desc: A prequel to A Better Tomorrow, Chow Yun-Fat stars as a younger Mark on a mission to get a friend out of Vietnam. He runs up against Ho, a local crime lord. Along the way he also meets Kit, a female gangster who helps the naive young Mark become a highly-capable gunman.(n)

programme.title: Pretty Ghost
programme.desc: A supernatural yuppie comedy, with Tony Leung as an architect whose love life becomes manipulated by ghost Rosamund Kwan.(n)

programme.title: Headlines
programme.desc: Daniel Wu, Emil Chow and Maggie Cheung Ho-yee play competitive news reporters whose professional and personal lives intersect.(n)

programme.title: Cop Of The Town
programme.desc: Ricky and Romeo are both veterans working in an elite police squad but cannot work well with a new female inspector. One day, Annie, a model, complains of being harassed by her former friend, Ricky. Romeo, who likes to flirt, takes up the case.(n)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Chun Wai is a young screenwriter who falls for aspiring actress Mei Ball, who can't find the success an actress of her calibre deserves. Instead, all the accolades go to Lulu, Mei Ball's gorgeous but unskilled actress friend.(n)

programme.title: To Spy With Love
programme.desc: A band featuring rock enthusiast Teddy and his Playgirls have just signed with a rock bar when trouble starts. Two Japanese hitmen, hired to get spy Yap and the treasure map hidden on her, somehow get into the rock bar and wreak great havoc. The bar owner blames it on Teddy.(n)

programme.title: Crying Heart
programme.desc: Mrs. Fat is slowly succumbing to cancer, but her biggest worry is her only child, 30-year-old Bee. Possessing the mind of a toddler but the hormonal urges of a sexually-aroused rhino, Bee finds himself in trouble with the gangster boyfriend of his neighbour May.(n)

programme.title: Chaos By Design
programme.desc: Fashion designer Kabo and Ah Sung become enemies due to a misunderstanding. Yet one special occasion matches them up.(n)

programme.title: Magnificent Warriors
programme.desc: Aviatrix Michelle Yeoh is a female Indiana Jones in an adventure that pits her and agent Derek Yee against the Japanese in 1938.(n)

programme.title: Heart Of Dragon
programme.desc: Jackie Chan plays a cop sacrificing his dreams to care for his retarded brother whose simplicity renders him an unsuspecting victim of a kidnapping.(n)

programme.title: Lucky Encounter
programme.desc: Crooks Tony Leung and Kent Cheng help five-year-old ghost Cheng Pak-lam achieve reincarnation in this supernatural Johnny To comedy.(n)

programme.title: The Reincarnation Of Golden Lotus
programme.desc: During the Song Dynasty, Pan Jinlian was beheaded and reborn into the body of a baby girl named Shan Yulian in Shanghai. In 1966, Mao Zedong launched the Cultural Revolution, and Shan Yulian was brought to be persecuted by the CPC Government.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: Nuwa awakens and agrees to marry Cheung San. On the wedding day, Tin Yau and Fan Yan end the life of Cheung San together. Tin Yau and Siu Ling grab the Pangu Bow and shoot the meteorite with the Heart Arrow.(n)

programme.title: Armour Of God II
programme.desc: Jackie Chan returns as grave robber Asian Hawk, who's contracted to find a hidden cache of Nazi gold. His journey leads him to various exotic locales and companionship with not one, but three comely females of differing origin.(n)

programme.title: Heart To Hearts
programme.desc: George Lam is Alex, a music producer who moonlights as a choir teacher. He takes a shine to one of his students, but her overprotective mother thinks he might be trying to date her.(n)

programme.title: All Night Long
programme.desc: This black comedy stars Dodo Cheng as a mousy teacher whose life is changed after an unwitting encounter with a corpse and $40 million.(n)

programme.title: Tiger Cage 2
programme.desc: An ex-cop and divorce lawyer team up with a gangster to clear their names after getting involved in a dirty money scheme led by a vicious money launderer.(n)

programme.title: Working Class
programme.desc: A factory worker falls in love unknowingly with his boss' daughter. However, on their first date, he vows never to marry a rich girl.(n)

programme.title: Long And Winding Road
programme.desc: Leslie and Tony, two bachelors, are bosom friends. Leslie is a wandering soul who seems unable to settle down. Tony is a frustrated musician and a part-time worker at an elderly home. He doesn't like old people, but works there only to get close to his dream girl Wai.(n)

programme.title: The Wrong Couples
programme.desc: In this award-winning comedy drama, spinster Josephine Siao and sailor Richard Ng are an odd couple forced to live under the same roof.(n)

programme.title: Fearless Hyena
programme.desc: One day, Lung discovers that Chi Hung was seriously wounded by Yen. Lung is very angry and fights with Yen and his subordinates.(n)

programme.title: All About Ah Long
programme.desc: Chow Yun-fat plays Ah-Long, a single father trying to raise his son, Porky. Ah-Long works as a truck driver at a construction site. The son's real mother, Por-por, had left Ah-Long 10 years ago for the United States after a lovers' spat.(n)

programme.title: She Shoots Straight
programme.desc: Policewoman Mina Kao and her supervisor Huang Tsung-pao experience the complications of a workplace romance and marriage.(n)

programme.title: Mr Smart
programme.desc: Mr Smart, actually a silly guy, opens a fast-food shop at Wong's suggestion. The business goes up and down, just like his courtship of a lady.(n)

programme.title: School On Fire
programme.desc: Chu Yuen Fong is a student who witnesses a triad beating, and is pressured by cops and teachers into testifying against the attackers. This is just Fong's initiation into the dark and disturbingly corrupt world of Hong Kong triads.(n)

programme.title: Fist Of Fury
programme.desc: Chen Jun joins the Jin Wu Martial Arts Academy in hopes of refining his skills and striking back at his oppressors. When Chen's master is poisoned by the leaders of the Japanese occupation, the furious student puts his skills to the ultimate test by embarking on a skull-cracking revenge spree.(n)

programme.title: Happy Go Lucky ()
programme.desc: A blind woman, a mentally-impaired man and a man with a nervous disorder form a friendship in this inspirational tale.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: With the power of Pangu, Siu Ling travels through time to prevent Shengmu from destroying the world. Siu Ling fights a hard battle with the God of Blood in order to save Jim Tau. They are trapped in an abandoned arsenal.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye My Love
programme.desc: Through a blood test, Lindy knows that she is been suffering from blood cancer. Lindy decides to move in a new flat where there occupies a notorious man who is a hot-tempered crook.(n)

programme.title: Crime Story
programme.desc: Inspector Eddie Chan is a brilliant but emotionally-troubled cop assigned to protect a real-estate mogul threatened with kidnapping. Unfortunately he's unable to prevent the abduction. Eddie is paired with cop Hung to track the kidnappers to Taiwan, but things seem to work against them.(n)

programme.title: Always On My Mind
programme.desc: Michael is a money-grubbing news anchor who's just discovered that he has cancer. The TV station he works at is also looking to fire him. Before the station has a chance to finalise the firing, though, the news anchor finds fame overnight thanks to his coverage of a sensational robbery.(n)

programme.title: Zu Warriors From The Magic Mount

programme.title: Profiles Of Pleasure

programme.title: Dragon Lord
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars as Dragon, a rebellious young man who is always getting into trouble along with his best friend, Cowboy. programme.title: Happy Ghost II
programme.desc: The ghost of Scholar Stewart Pik reincarnates and is now a high school teacher named Hong Sam Kwai. Kwai becomes a victim to endless pranks by his students until he is able to counteract with his gift of magical powers.(n)

programme.title: City On Fire

programme.title: The Ghost Snatchers

programme.desc: Buddy cops Porky and Big Mouth are promoted to the anti-prostitution division after solving a robbery case. To crack down on a prostitution ring, the bumbling duo arrange for Margaret to go undercover.(n)
